tvdb: Rafe and Livvie are stunned it's Joshua behind the mask, not someone else.  Rafe asks Livvie whom she thought it was, but she instead accuses him of creating Tess, which he denies.  After remembering Caleb again, Livvie makes plan to visit Kevin for his help with Tess.  Rafe decides to focus on his slayer skills to uncover a new veiled threat.  Ian lies near death, as Lucy calls an ambulance.  Tess privately lays her hands on Ian, who miraculously recovers.  After having pasionate sex, Elizabeth tells Stephen about Alison, then Rafe, whom Stephen seems to know.  Ali interrupts their tryst by arriving at the door.
